rules: Logs are structured JSON with required fields and schema version
ONE JSON object per line (JSONL) with ISO-8601 UTC timestamps
Include monotonic_hw_time_ms for ordering; UTF-8 encoding only
App logs ≥ 14 days locally; receipts ≥ 90 days
Rotate at 100MB; keep last 10 files locally
Logging overhead < 5% CPU; sampling for chatty events
Test log generation and validation in unit tests
Document logging schema and field meanings
Ensure logs meet compliance requirements and audit standards
